thread.title: Wuchang: Fallen Feathers Gameplay Shows Off Big Bosses, Fierce Combat, and More
thread.title_full: Wuchang: Fallen Feathers Gameplay Shows Off Big Bosses, Fierce Combat, and More

author: Richard Walker
title: Wuchang: Fallen Feathers Gameplay Shows Off Big Bosses, Fierce Combat, and More
text: Wuchang: Fallen Feathers Gameplay Shows Off Big Bosses, Fierce Combat, and More 0 505 Games and developer Leenzee Games has offered a look [Wuchang: Fallen Feathers](https://www.xboxachievements.com/news/news-39828-wuchang-fallen-feathers-a-souls-like-based-on-chinese-mythology-shows-off-18-minutes-of-gameplay.html) in a new gameplay vid, showcasing some of the soulslike RPG action you can expect when the game launches next year. Boasting fast and fierce combat, Wuchang will see you facing massive bosses in a dark fantasy Ming Dynasty setting, including a centipede-like monster, and a woman who transforms into a living scarf made out of arctic fox skin. Hmm. Traversing the mystical land of Shu, you'll need to uncover forgotten secrets before you're consumed by a Feathering disease. You can see some of the powerful abilities you'll be able to unleash in the new trailer below. [Wuchang: Fallen Feathers](https://www.xboxachievements.com/news/wuchang-fallen-feathers-chinese-soulslike-rpg-action-day-one-xbox-game-pass/) is coming to Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 5, and PC in 2025.
